title: BLOOD MOON YASUO MAJOR PROBLEM
body:
So at certain angles within the skin for the wall, the wall is essentially completely invisible, I legitmately Graves ulted into this wall like 3 times because i couldn't see it out.

This needs to be fixed for clarity.

replies.body: Thing like this are always frustrating, and I can see what you mean.  But you are not the only person to have an issue with this hopefully it will be fixed some time soon ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Lajneen,realm=EUW,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tcQ6dksF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-27T16:53:52.048+0000)
>
> Learn 2 play, n00b.

leave him alone %%% teemo maining scrub

> [{quoted}](name=lordofrage,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tcQ6dksF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-27T17:27:31.283+0000)
>
> leave him alone %%% teemo maining scrub

Do not speak to an EUW overl0rd with that tone, OCE underling.
